oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An experiential formula for the energy eigenvalues of a particle in a one-dimension finite-deep square well potential
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zhang, Zhi-Ming
Yuan, Chun-Hua
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose an experiential formula for the calculation of the energy eigenvalues of a particle moving in a one-dimension finite-deep square well potential after some physical considerations. This formula shows a simple relation between the energy eigenvalues and the potential papameters, and can be used to estimate the energy eigenvalues in a very simple way.
